alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 6:12AM AKST until January 09 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches with highest amounts in Port Alexander. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Port Alexander. * WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to noon AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ponding could develop after a changeover to rain. There is a chance snow could mix with freezing rain at times. A change to all rain is expected on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
